attributes.action: Stop primary and secondary schools opening in all tiers during this pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Because we believe as parents that the decisions made at this precise time are not right and we believe as parents we should have the choice to send our children to school or not without being fined or prosecuted.
attributes.background: We need the government to realise that all children are not currently safe at school while this pandemic is getting worse and there is a new variant that is more transmissible and we could see this in schools and cases will rise more.
